title: The Small Things That Add Up
itunes:author: Guest: Gary Thomas
itunes:summary:
Small decisions that add up over time can lead to big results. The same principle applies to the investments you make in your marriage. John, Greg and Erin share how you can get started with making little changes to better your relationship. Featuring Mr. Gary Thomas.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "A Lifelong Love" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-14?refcd=1468805


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/the-small-things-that-add-up/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/breathe-spiritual-life-into-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1468805


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
